solution_line_template: She has a total of {pears}+{oranges}+{apples} = <<{pears}+{oranges}+{apples}={total_fruits}>>{total_fruits} fruits.
She gives her sister {pears_given} pears+{oranges_given} oranges+{apples_given} apples = <<{pears_given}+{oranges_given}+{apples_given}={total_given}>>{total_given} fruits.
After giving her sister 2 of each fruit, she has {total_fruits}-{total_given} = <<{total_fruits}-{total_given}={fruits_left}>>{fruits_left} fruits left.
